name: One Last Quest (Avacup)
description:
One Last Quest

Embark on an exciting adventure with mighty heroes and dive into an ancient tomb to vanquish the evil lurking within! Control four unique characters, each with their own abilities, which are essential to your success in defeating the darkness that awaits. 

Developed by Ackerman Cecilia, Harris Eyal, Kołodziejczyk Hanna and Maureder Christoph!

University of Europe for Applied Sciences

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. 

Supervised by: Prof. Lena Falkenhagen

WiSe2022 // Game`n`Play
